Alert.Name: sme-notification
Alert.Subject: The Coaching activity for your project @@Project_Acronym@@

Message.Text: Dear @@Contact_First_Name@@ @@Contact_Last_Name@@,

Congratulations and welcome to the SME Champions League! You are now close to getting your grant. EASME is committed to the successful commercialisation of your project and the growth of your company. That is why your grant is combined with professional business coaching (see https://ec.europa.eu/easme/sites/easme-site/files/basic-principles.pdf) paid directly by us.

The coaching offer links you up with experienced business innovation coaches. They will bring perspective and confidence during the challenging times to help you navigate through complicated business development matters. Our coaching approach has a proven track record and a very high satisfaction rate with high growth SME clients. We will cover the costs for three days of coaching for phase 1 and twelve days in phase 2 beneficiaries.

As a first step, you will be contacted by @@KAM_First_Name@@ @@KAM_Last_Name@@, from the Enterprise Europe Network (EEN) team in your region (see http://een.ec.europa.eu/about/branches). They will work with you to establish your coaching priorities and help you identify a suitable coach. And then you are off! Our aim is to start the coaching as soon as the grant is signed.
Please be assured that we take the confidentiality of your project very seriously, therefore EEN and the coaches have received only publicly available project data.
Should you have any questions on coaching, please do not hesitate to contact us at EASME-SME-COACHING@ec.europa.eu
I wish you good work, good luck and success.

Block.Line: EASME, Head of Unit H2020 SME Instrument
